description: ff. 292. 182 x 137; 128 x 92 mm. 19 lin. 15th/16th cen. (before 906 H.)-on fol. 1a ownership note of Ibrāhīm ibn Aḥmad ibn al-Mullā, dat. 987; his notes on the margins and the last fol. Gloss on al-Maḥallīʼs al-Badr al-ṭālīʻ: Brockelmann, GAL, II, 109 (commentary c, gloss α); S II, 105. Incip.: ... قال ... احمد الله على ما منح من الاهتداء
author: Ibn Abī Sharīf, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1419 or 20-1500 or 1501
